Afropolitan Vibes bụ usoro egwu egwu na-eme kwa afọ na Lagos, Nigeria

Ọ bụ Ade Bantu na Abby Ogunsanya keputara ihe ngosi ahụ na 2013 dị ka ikpo okwu iji gosipụta egwu ọzọ. Mbipụta ọ bụla nwere ndị na-agụ egwú / ndị na-ede egwú nke oge a atọ ma ọ bụ anọ, ndị na-abụ abụ ma ọ bụ ndị na-egwu egwu na-arụkarị ọrụ mbụ ndị gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na mmalite egwu Africa nke Afrobeat, Afrofunk, Afro-hiphop, Afro'pop, na Highlife. Site na 2013 ruo 2017 Afropolitan Vibes nwere ebe obibi kwa ọnwa na Freedom Park, bụbu ụlọ mkpọrọ British Colonial na Lagos Island
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2017, ndị na-emepụta ihe ngosi ahụ kwupụtara mgbanwe ebe a ga-anọ gaa na Muri Okunola Park na Lagos nakwa na usoro egwu ahụ ga-emezi na Fraịdee nke atọ nke nkega ọbula
Akụkụ gafere nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Afropolitan Vibes ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu ugboro
E mere mbipụta mbụ nke Afropolitan Vibes Festival e mere na 16th na 17 December 2016 na Lagos.
Afropolitan Vibe franchise na-enwekwa obere egwu egwu a na-akpọ Urban Sessions

Ihe ngosi ahụ na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ ma mkpa dapụta ma gosipụta onye na-agụ egwu / onye na-ede egwu Afro-German Patrice, onye na-akpọ egwu Naijiria Brymo & onye ama ama Naijiria Blackman Akeeb Kareem.
E gosipụtakwara Urban Session dị ka akụkụ dị mkpa nke Afropolitan Vibes Music Festival

Ndị na-agụ egwú / ndị na-ede egwú Falana, Aduke, Ayo Awosika, Mary Akpa, Nosa, Tomi Thomas, Keziah Jones, Kaline, Sina Ayinde Bakare, Jinmi Abdul na ndị inyom na-agụ egwu Adunni & Nefertiti niile rụrụ ọrụ na-enweghị njikọ ma ọ bụ ụda
Ade Bantu gbara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ ajụjụ ọnụ tupu ha etinye ha n'otu n'otu
